message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that your job application for the position of {{ doc.designation }} at {{ doc.custom_company }} has been successfully submitted. Thank you for your interest in becoming a part of our team.

Job Application Details:

  • Position Applied For: {{ doc.designation }}
  • Application ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Job Opening: {{ doc.job_title }}
  • Status: Your application is under review.

We will contact you shortly with the next steps in the process. Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
The HR Team
name: HR Job Application Creation Mail
subject: HR Interview Availability Revert Mail
